overview:
The Kool Source is a small Atlanta digital marketing firm with a big heart. Their goal is to help organizations improve their bottom line by utilizing the latest technology to meet their marketing objectives. They offer innovative solutions for almost any piece of internet marketing strategy PLUS they extend their recommendations beyond the internet, optimizing the connections between online marketing, offline marketing, and mobile marketing.

The Kool Source appreciates the uniqueness of each individual client. They also understand that keeping up with rapidly changing technology is generally not an option for a manager or owner consumed with their particular line of work. It’s their job to sift through the myriad of options, providing concise, understandable and timely advice in regards to your marketing and design solutions.
